p.d: : Hacktivists Not all hackers are ill-intentioned and some are even a force for good. Their intentions may be noble but their methods are still illegal. Matthieu Dugal meets these modern-day Robin Hoods and surfs the "Darknet" with a member of Anonymous. Directed by: Bachir Bensaddek (Canada, 2016) Presented by: Matthieu Dugal With Benoît Gagnon, Benoît Dupont, Gabriella Coleman, P@r@dise.
